titles.title: A bill to require that, in the administration of any benefits program established by or under Federal law which requires the use of data obtained in the most recent decennial census, the 1990 adjusted census data be considered the official data for such census.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1198-1199)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Directs that, in the administration of any benefits program established by or under Federal law which requires the use of data obtained in the most recent decennial census, the 1990 adjusted census data be considered the official data for such census.
